name: May I Have Your Attention, Please (Fowlest)
name_original: May I Have Your Attention, Please (Fowlest)
description:
Play up to four minigames simultaneously!  Can you control the chaos and emerge triumphant? 

With 14 different minigames and two game modes,  this game will push your coordination and multitasking skills to the limit!

Have fun!

Controls:
Games on the left side of the screen use WASD and mouse.
Games on the right side of the screen use the arrow keys and mouse.
